text-snippet.content:
Log Information: We collect log information about your use of the Platform, including the type of browser that you use.
the time, duration and frequency of your access.
Platform pages viewed.
your IP address.
and the page you visited before visiting our Platform.

Device Information: We collect information about the computer or mobile device that you use to access our Platform, including the hardware model, operating system and version, unique device identifiers, and mobile network information.
<li
